document.full_text: forces loyal to ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara launched a heavy attack on wednesday on the bunker where laurent gbagbo is holed up but appeared to have been repelled, a western military source said.
document.title: attack on gbagbo bunker in ivory coast repelled
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara launched a heavy attack on wednesday on the bunker where laurent gbagbo is holed up but appeared to have been repelled, a western military source said.
